channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #130 – Game Project Organization, Using Globals, and Handling Debugging Statements

item.title: By: Steve
item.dc:creator: Steve
item.description:
I would like to suggest TapitUP! Its only game mode is to gain the highest score possible.
Its a quick, reaction based game made with Corona. I made it, shameless plug. TapitUP is available for IOS/Droid
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/tapitup!/id878687926?ls=1&mt=8 https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=game.tapitup.com
Steve
item.content:encoded:
I would like to suggest TapitUP! Its only game mode is to gain the highest score possible.

Its a quick, reaction based game made with Corona. I made it, shameless plug. TapitUP is available for IOS/Droid
